name: Refrigerator Vestfrost 379RRETRO - 190x60x63, 315 Litres, A+ , RED RETRO
origAbout: For those who value both excellent design and functionality, and who enjoy experimenting with different styles, Vestfrost has redefined the modern fridge-freezer. The retro line is characterized by stylish design, rounded corners and a sleek finish of the interior – all of this combined with advanced technological solutions. Thanks to NoFrost Multi, frost and ice do not build up on the walls of the fridge and freezer. Food is cooled evenly, does not dry out and stays fresh longer. Odors do not spread between the fridge and freezer compartments.
